Interface Board

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameBoard
public interface Board
Defines the contract for a Tetris game board, covering brick movement, rotation, holding and spawning, merging into the background, row clearing, and access to view and score data.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Eashwar

    Modifier and Type

    clearHold()
    Clears the held brick slot.

    Merges the active brick into the board background, locking its cells.

    Moves the active brick one row downward if possible.

    boolean
    moveBrickRight()
    Moves the active brick one column to the right if possible.

    newGame()
    Resets the board state and starts a new game.
    boolean
    rotateLeftBrick()
    Rotates the active brick counterclockwise if possible.

  • Method Details

    • moveBrickDown

      boolean moveBrickDown()
      Moves the active brick one row downward if possible.
      Returns:
      true if the brick moved successfully; false if blocked or locked

    • moveBrickLeft

      boolean moveBrickLeft()
      Moves the active brick one column to the left if possible.
      Returns:
      true if the brick moved successfully; false otherwise

    • moveBrickRight

      boolean moveBrickRight()
      Moves the active brick one column to the right if possible.
      Returns:
      true if the brick moved successfully; false otherwise

    • rotateLeftBrick

      boolean rotateLeftBrick()
      Rotates the active brick counterclockwise if possible.
      Returns:
      true if the brick rotated successfully; false otherwise

    • holdBrick

      boolean holdBrick()
      Holds the active brick or swaps with the held brick according to rules.
      Returns:
      true if a hold or swap occurred; false otherwise

    • createNewBrick

      boolean createNewBrick()
      Spawns a new active brick.
      Returns:
      true if a new brick was created; false if spawn failed

    • getBoardMatrix

      int[][] getBoardMatrix()

    • getViewData

      ViewData getViewData()

    • mergeBrickToBackground

      void mergeBrickToBackground()
      Merges the active brick into the board background, locking its cells.

    • clearRows

      ClearRow clearRows()
      Clears completed rows and returns the details of the operation.
      Returns:
      summary information about cleared rows

    • getScore

      Score getScore()

    • newGame

      void newGame()
      Resets the board state and starts a new game.

    • clearHold

      void clearHold()
      Clears the held brick slot.
